entry.title: Tiger Fire (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that two days after it had ignited, the Tiger Fire (pictured) had already burned 5,567 acres (2,253 ha) of land near Black Canyon City, Arizona?

entry.title: 2022 Berlin Marathon (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in the 2022 Berlin Marathon, Tigist Assefa won by running the third-fastest marathon ever by a woman, in just her second marathon, breaking her personal best by nearly 20 minutes?

entry.title: Clinton D. Burdick (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Clinton D. Burdick and his father Howard are the only father–son pair to receive the title of flying ace?

entry.title: Rockstar Vienna (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Rockstar Vienna was the largest video game developer in Austria when it closed in 2006?

entry.title: Harry Langford (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Harry Langford still turned up for football practice the day after he received a concussion, passed out, and was hospitalized?

entry.title: Action Deaf Youth (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after visiting Hungary in 2015, members of Action Deaf Youth headed to Stormont to demand better sign language support in Northern Ireland?

entry.title: Darrell Mudra (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Darrell Mudra was known as "Dr. Victory"?

entry.title: The Queue (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that people queued in a queue to queue in The Queue?
